text: Valorant (stylized as VALORANT) is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first- person shooter developed and published by Riot Games, for Microsoft Windows. First talked about under the codename Project A in October 2020, the game began a closed beta period with limited access on April 7, 2020, followed by official release on June 2, 2020. title: Valorant
